text: I was being bothered by a fly. I scared her, but she came back, so I scared her back. Finally, he said, "No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. Okay, I'll wait until... he's a little off and he's lying on a dead dog. What? I asked. He didn't answer. And I didn't insist, afraid I'd know the answer. Fin 1991
title: La mosca
author: Slawomir Mrozek
